mapper.select: SELECT reservation.reservation_id AS reservation_id, reservation.seat_id AS seat_id, reservation.start_date AS start_date, reservation.end_date AS end_date, reservation.note AS note, project.proj_name AS project_name, client.client_name AS client_name FROM tbl_reservation AS reservation LEFT JOIN tbl_project_mst AS project ON reservation.proj_id = project.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_clients_mst AS client ON project.client_id = client.client_id WHERE reservation.start_date BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} OR reservation.end_date BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}

SELECT reservation.reservation_id AS reservation_id, reservation.seat_id AS seat_id, reservation.start_date AS start_date, reservation.end_date AS end_date, reservation.note AS note, project.proj_name AS project_name, client.client_name AS client_name FROM tbl_reservation AS reservation LEFT JOIN tbl_project_mst AS project ON reservation.proj_id = project.proj_id LEFT JOIN tbl_clients_mst AS client ON project.client_id = client.client_id WHERE reservation.start_date = #{start_date}
